title: Champion select problem
body: I went to play a ranked game clicked accept after about 2 min. In champ select, the bar to select my rune page and masteries were gone and I couldn't see them. I also couldn't see any pictures of champions on the screen. Thus, I was unable to select or ban a champion. This happened to me twice in a row and I don't know what's wrong. Please help! (30 minute queue dodge timer)

replies.body:
It sounds like there's an *unstable connection* between your client and the matchmaking servers. A common reason this happens is if you're running certain network settings that conflict with League. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will help you configure your local network settings for League to ensure this isn't the case.

Let me know if those steps didn't end up resolving this for you.
